title: The Tryptych III
description: The Tryptych III, completes the trilogy with the tale of the magical relief carving that changed the lives of Elsa's family forever. The Decalogue is stolen from the museum, and the family sets out to reinstate it. However, they did not account for adultery, time travel, ghosts and revenge. Enjoy the story as it explores London in all its glory to solve the crime. Pocahontas, Henry VIII and his exploding coffin. All woven together to create a magical tale. Is there a happy ending? Only time will tell...
author: Catherine Habbie
